titles.title: A resolution recognizing the freedom of Muslims of the United States to exercise their religion and participate in the civil systems of their country.
A resolution recognizing the freedom of Muslims of the United States to exercise their religion and participate in the civil systems of their country.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: Recognizes the religious freedom of American Muslims and their civic contributions to the United States.
